snippet: A rights group says that former rebel fighters have tortured some of the detainees swept up by the thousands in Tripoli, Libya.

lead_paragraph: A rights group says that former rebel fighters have tortured some of the detainees swept up by the thousands in Tripoli, Libya.

headline.main: Anti-Qaddafi Fighters Are Accused of Torture
